import React, { useState } from "react" import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import FormContainer from "../../components/FormContainer/FormContainer" import { register } from "../../redux/user/userAction" const ShippingPage = ({ history }) => { const [shippingInfo, setShippingInfo] = useState({ address: "", city: "", postalCode: "", country: "", }) const { address, city, postalCode, country } = shippingInfo const shippingInfoOnChange = (e) => { const { value, name } = e.target setShippingInfo((preval) => ({ ...preval, [name]: value })) } return (

Shipping

address city postalCode address
) } export default ShippingPage
